info.title: Virus Total
info.description: Virus Total is an online service that analyzes suspicious files and URLs to detect types of malware and malicious content using antivirus engines and website scanners. It provides an API that allows users to access the information generated by VirusTotal.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: URL identifier or base64 representation of URL to scan

get.summary: Retrieve information about a file or URL analysis
get.description: Retrieve information about a file or URL analysis. This action uses the output id of Analyse an URL or Upload and analyse a file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SHA-256, SHA-1 or MD5 identifying the file

authentihash.description: sha256 hash used by Microsoft to verify that the relevant sections of a PE image file have not been altered

creation_date.description: Extracted when possible from the file's metadata

first_submission_date.description: Date when the file was first seen in VirusTotal. UTC timestamp

last_analysis_date.description: Most recent scan date. UTC timestamp

harmless.description: Number of reports saying that is harmless

malicious.description: Number of reports saying that is malicious

suspicious.description: Number of reports saying that is suspicious

timeout.description: Number of timeouts when checking this URL

undetected.description: Number of reports saying that is undetected

last_analysis_stats.description: A summary of the latest scan results

last_modification_date.description: Date when the object itself was last modified. UTC timestamp

last_submission_date.description: Most recent date the file was posted to VirusTotal. UTC timestamp

magic.description: gives a guess of the file type based on a popular parsing tool from unix

meaningful_name.description: The most interesting name out of all file's names

names.description: All file names associated with the file

pe_info.description: Returns information about the structure of Microsoft Windows PE files

reputation.description: File's score calculated from all votes posted by the VirusTotal community

signature_info.description: Contains information about digital signature for Windows Executable and Mach-O files,

ssdeep.description: CTPH hash of the file content

times_submitted.description: Number of times the file has been posted to VirusTotal

total_votes.description: nweighted number of total votes from the community, divided in harmless and malicious

unique_sources.description: Indicates from how many different sources the file has been posted from

vhash.description: In-house similarity clustering algorithm value based on a simple structural feature hash allows you to find similar files

results.description: Dictionary having the engine's name as key and its result as value

confirmed-timeout.description: Number of AV engines that reach a timeout when analysing that file

failure.description: Number of AV engines that fail when analysing that file

harmless.description: Number of reports saying that is harmless

malicious.description: Number of reports saying that is malicious

suspicious.description: Number of reports saying that is suspicious

timeout.description: Number of timeouts when analysing this URL/file

type-unsupported.description: Number of AV engines that don't support that type of file

undetected.description: Number of reports saying that is undetected

categories.description: They key is the partner who categorised the URL and the value is the URL's category according to that partner

first_submission_date.description: UTC timestamp of the date where the URL was first submitted to VirusTotal

html_meta.description: containing all meta tags (only for URLs downloading a HTML). Keys are the meta tag name and value is a list containing all values of that meta tag

last_analysis_date.description: UTC timestamp representing last time the URL was scanned

last_analysis_results.description: Result from URL scanners. Dictionary with scanner name as key and a dict with notes / result from that scanner as value

harmless.description: Number of reports saying that is harmless

malicious.description: Number of reports saying that is malicious

suspicious.description: Number of reports saying that is suspicious

timeout.description: Number of timeouts when checking this URL

undetected.description: Number of reports saying that is undetected

last_analysis_stats.description: Number of different results from this scans

last_final_url.description: If the original URL redirects where does it end

last_http_response_code.description: HTTP response code of the last response

last_http_response_content_length.description: Length in bytes of the content received

last_http_response_headers.description: Containing headers and values of last HTTP respons

last_modification_date.description: UTC timestamp representing last modification date

last_submission_date.description: UTC timestamp representing last time it was sent to be analysed

reputation.description: Value of votes from VirusTotal community

targeted_brand.description: Targeted brand info extracted from phishing engines

times_submitted.description: Number of times that URL has been checked

total_votes.description: Containing the number of positive ("harmless") and negative ("malicious") votes received from VT community

trackers.description: Contains all found trackers in that URL in a historical manner

as_owner.description: Owner of the Autonomous System to which the IP belongs

asn.description: Autonomous System Number to which the IP belongs

continent.description: Continent where the IP is placed (ISO-3166 continent code)

country.description: Country where the IP is placed (ISO-3166 country code)

last_analysis_results.description: Result from URL scanners. Dictionary with scanner name as key and a dictionary with notes/result from that scanner as value

last_analysis_stats.description: Number of different results from this scans

harmless.description: Number of reports saying that is harmless

malicious.description: Number of reports saying that is malicious

suspicious.description: Number of reports saying that is suspicious

timeout.description: Number of timeouts when checking this URL

undetected.description: Number of reports saying that is undetected

last_https_certificate.description: SSL Certificate object certificate information for that IP

last_https_certificate_date.description: Date when the certificate shown in last_https_certificate was retrieved by VirusTotal. UTC timestamp

last_modification_date.description: Date when any of the IP's information was last updated. UTC timestamp

network.description: IPv4 network range to which the IP belongs

reputation.description: IP's score calculated from the votes of the VirusTotal's community

total_votes.description: Unweighted number of total votes from the community, divided in "harmless" and "malicious"

whois.description: WHOIS information as returned from the pertinent whois server

whois_date.description: Date of the last update of the whois record in VirusTotal. UTC timestamp

categories.description: Mapping that relates categorisation services with the category it assigns the domain to. These services are, among others such as Alexa, BitDefender, TrendMicro, Websense ThreatSeeker, etc.

creation_date.description: Creation date extracted from the Domain's whois (UTC timestamp)

last_analysis_results.description: Result from URL scanners. Dictionary with scanner name as key and a dictionary with notes/result from that scanner as value

harmless.description: Number of reports saying that is harmless

malicious.description: Number of reports saying that is malicious

suspicious.description: Number of reports saying that is suspicious

timeout.description: Number of timeouts when checking this URL

undetected.description: Number of reports saying that is undetected

last_analysis_stats.description: Number of different results from this scans

last_dns_records.description: Domain's DNS records on its last scan

last_dns_records_date.description: Date when the dns records list was retrieved by VirusTotal (UTC timestamp)

last_https_certificate.description: SSL Certificate object retrieved last time the domain was analysed

last_https_certificate_date.description: Date when the certificate was retrieved by VirusTotal (UTC timestamp)

last_modification_date.description: Date when any of domain's information was last updated

last_update_date.description: Updated date extracted from whois (UTC timestamp)

popularity_ranks.description: Domain's position in popularity ranks such as Alexa, Quantcast, Statvoo, etc.

reputation.description: Domain's score calculated from the votes of the VirusTotal's community

total_votes.description: Unweighted number of total votes from the community, divided in "harmless" and "malicious"

whois.description: WHOIS information as returned from the pertinent whois server

whois_date.description: Date of the last update of the whois record in VirusTotal
